remarks.format: ## Remarks 的许多行为 （包括通过设备模板集和内部分页对模板呈现的支持）类似于的行为 。Much of the behavior of the , including support for templated rendering through device template sets and internal pagination, is similar to the behavior of the . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ObjectList 控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/d7hb3s0f(v=vs.85)) 或 [分页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/8ss4ds3k(v=vs.100)) 文档简介。For more information, see the [Introduction to the ObjectList Control](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/d7hb3s0f(v=vs.85)) or the [Pagination](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/8ss4ds3k(v=vs.100)) documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建用户定义的类的数组，并 在加载页面时将其绑定到对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create an array of a user-defined class and then bind it to an object when the page loads. 它还显示列表和详细信息视图显示命令的方式。It also shows how the list and details views display the commands. 对于本示例，还有一个按钮，该按钮显示窗体，其中包含使用属性的所有字段的列表 。For this example, there is also a button that displays a form with a list of all the fields using the property. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 为，则对象列表将处理集合中的字段顺序 。When `true`, the object list handles the fields order in the collection. 如果为 `false` ，则必须指定字段的顺序，并将 属性设置为绑定到数据源。When `false`, you must specify the order of the fields and set the property to bind to a data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在控件的详细信息视图中以静态方式将字段与其集合关联 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to statically associate the fields with their collection in the Details view of an control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置后， 控件尝试呈现一个快捷键来调用默认命令。When set, the control attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command. 在 HTML 中，列表视图中的默认呈现显示第一个字段作为指向的详细信息视图的链接 。In HTML, the default rendering in list view displays the first field as a link to the details view of the . 设置属性时，单击该链接将调用默认命令。When the property is set, clicking the link invokes the default command. 调用默认命令会引发 事件。Invoking the default command raises the event. 对象的设置为属性的值 。The of the object is set to the value of the property. 即使定义了默认命令，也应在命令集合中包含具有相同名称的命令。Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection. 如果控件无法呈现包含默认命令的快捷方式的图形元素，则默认命令仍可通过执行 命令集合来实现。If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available through the rendering of the commands collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义事件处理程序时，会在 通过用户交互生成项事件时通知处理程序。When an event handler is defined, the notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction. 使用模板呈现对象列表时，将 通过 ASP.NET 的事件冒泡机制调用事件处理程序。When you render an object list by using templates, the event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET. 向事件处理程序传递一个类型为的参数 ，该参数包含有关源项和 生成事件的控件的属性的信息。The event handler is passed an argument of type , which contains information about the source item and the property of the control that generated the event. 这允许您呈现具有多个关联交互的单个项。This allows you to render a single item with multiple associated interactions. 默认呈现时，控件呈现为对象列表定义的每个命令作为链接。On default rendering, the control renders each of the commands defined for the object list as a link. 当用户单击链接时，将 调用事件处理程序，并使用类型为的参数 ，该参数包含有关源项的信息。When the user clicks a link, the event handler is called with an argument of type , which contains information about the source item. 属性中的值 是用户调用的命令的名称。The value in the property is the name of the command that the user invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event. 属性指定要执行的操作。The property specifies what action to perform. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks `More`呈现链接是为了提供从的的到的链接 `ListView` `DetailsView` 。The `More` link is rendered to provide a link from the `ListView` of the to the `DetailsView` of the . 必须满足以下条件 `More` 才能呈现链接：The following conditions must be met for the `More` link to be rendered: - 必须设置属性。The property must be set. - 必须在详细信息视图中呈现其他字段或命令。There must be additional fields or commands to be rendered in the details view. 的默认呈现方式将 中的第一个字段显示 `ListView` 为指向页面的链接 `DetailsView` 。The default rendering of the displays the first field in the `ListView` as a link to the `DetailsView` page. 设置 属性将重写此链接，并使其引发 事件。Setting the property overrides this link and causes it to raise the event. 因此，将 `More` 呈现链接以提供指向的链接 `DetailsView` 。As a result, the `More` link is rendered to provide a link to the `DetailsView`. > [!NOTE] > 此属性与 在 WAP 浏览器上使用的属性不同。This property is not the same as the property, which is used on WAP browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件参数包含对项和命令集合的引用。The event argument contains a reference to the item and to the collection of commands. 事件处理程序可以根据项自定义集合。An event handler can customize the collection according to the item. 应用程序可以使用 事件提供与特定于项的快捷菜单相同的功能。Applications can use the event to provide functionality equivalent to item-specific shortcut menus. 在此事件期间对命令集合所做的更改不会持久保存。Changes made to the collection of commands during this event are not persisted. 此事件在 调用事件之后调用。This event is called after the event is called. 在显示详细信息视图之前，可以使用此事件来执行其他任务。You can use this event to perform other tasks before showing the detail view. 您可以添加、删除或重新排列字段，具体取决于在列表视图中选择的项。You can add, remove, or rearrange fields, depending on the item selected in the list view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件从 的详细信息视图的中移除项 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to remove an item from the of the detail view of an . 在列表视图中选择要删除的项。The item to remove is selected in the list view. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下选项可通过枚举使用此属性 。The following options are available for this property through the enumeration. |成员名称Member Name|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||当包含对象列表的页第一次呈现时，此视图作为默认视图显示。This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time. 它包含项的标签字段，或者 ，如果属性不为空，则为一个表，其中的列与项的表字段和行对应。It consists of either the label fields of the items, or if the property is not empty, a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows for the items. 在 HTML 中，此视图与命令视图结合，命令显示为列表下的超链接。In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the list. 详细信息视图中有详细信息时，将呈现每个显示详细信息视图的项的超链接。When there is more information in the Details view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the Details view is rendered.| ||在 HTML 中，此视图与命令视图结合，命令显示为超链接的详细信息。In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.| ||此视图只在 WML 设备上呈现。This view is rendered separately only for WML devices. 它包含带有命令的菜单 。It consists of a menu with the commands of the . 对于 HTML 设备，列表视图和详细信息视图每个都与此视图结合，命令显示为详细信息或列表下的超链接。For HTML devices, the List view and Details view are each combined with this view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details or list.| > [!NOTE] > 若要在代码中设置此属性，必须在将此属性设置为或查看之前选择列表中的项 。To set this property in code, an item in the list must be selected before setting this property to or view. 尝试在选择项之前设置属性会引发异常。An attempt to set the property before selecting an item throws an exception. 视图模式是在私有视图状态中保存的，因此无论 对象的属性是否 为 `true` ，视图模式都将作为私有字段保存。A view mode is persisted in a private view state, so that, regardless of whether the property of the object is `true`, the view mode is persisted as a private field. 但是，如果 属性为 `false` ，则不会在请求之间保留 items 集合，这需要为每个请求重复数据绑定。However, if the property is `false`, the items collection is not persisted between requests, requiring a data bind to be repeated for each request.
